amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Violent Gang and Gun Crime Reduction Program by $8.5 million and to reduce funding for NASA's Construction and Environmental Compliance and Restoration account by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance by $8.5 million and to reduce funding for Science (Construction and Environmental Compliance and Restoration) by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A038) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 212 (Roll no. 251).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A038) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 212 (Roll no. 251).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A038) offered by Mr. Cicilline.
